name: Glowing Sky
description: W A S D : Move SPACE : Jump LEFT SHIFT : Run. In this game you will be challenged to getting through levels in under a minute. Every 10 seconds you will loose a movement option. Example: After the first 10 seconds, you will no longer be able to go backwards. READ: You have the ability to sprint in the air to travel further. The Yellow Cross in each level is your goal. Have Fun! (This is a game jam entry for the GMTK Game Jam of 2020).
